local_intent: Guarded vertical descent until table contact, ensuring grasp is stable and confirming contact before placement.
assumptions: Object is already grasped and positioned above the intended placement area
Contact threshold of 10 is appropriate for safe table contact
coherence_with_global: Implements the LowerUntilContact phase with identical parameters from GLOBAL_BT and verifies contact before PlaceDown, consistent with the guarded approach in the task description.
